panels.title: Current Partition Stats (See Drop Down) -- Currently Selected Partition: $partition

targets.query: select sum(cores_used)/sum(cores_avail_total)*100 from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m)
select sum(mem_allocated)/sum(mem_avail_total)*100 from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m)
select last(count) from slurm_nodedata where type='busy' and partition =~ /^$partition/
select last(count) from slurm_nodedata where type='idle' and partition =~ /^$partition/
select last(count) from slurm_nodedata where type='offline' and partition =~ /^$partition/
select *::field from slurm_jobsumdata where type = 'pendingbyreason'  and partition =~ /^$partition/ and time > now() - 5m
select sum(gpu_used)/sum(gpu_avail_total)*100 from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m)
select count from slurm_jobsumdata where partition =~ /^$partition/ and type='running' and $timeFilter
select mean(count) from slurm_jobsumdata where partition =~ /^$partition/ and type='running' and $timeFilter
select mean(count) from slurm_jobsumdata where partition =~ /^$partition/ and type='pending' and $timeFilter
select mean("usage") from (select sum(cores_used)/sum(cores_avail_total)*100 as usage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m))
select mean("usage") from (select sum(mem_allocated)/sum(mem_avail_total)*100 as usage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m))
select mean("usage") from (select sum(gpu_used)/sum(gpu_avail_total)*100 as usage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m))

panels.title: Stats For Time Range Selected in Time Picker -- Partition: $partition

targets.query: select sum(count) from slurm_jobsumdata where partition =~ /^$partition/ and type='running' and $timeFilter group by time(1m)
select sum(count) from slurm_jobsumdata where partition =~ /^$partition/ and type='pending' and $timeFilter group by time(1m)
select sum(count) from slurm_nodedata where partition =~ /^$partition/ AND type='busy' and $timeFilter group by time(1m)
select sum(count) from slurm_nodedata where partition =~ /^$partition/ AND type='idle' and $timeFilter group by time(1m)
select sum(count) from slurm_nodedata where partition =~ /^$partition/ AND type='offline' and $timeFilter group by time(1m)
select sum(cores_used)/sum(cores_avail_total)*100 from slurm_detail_node_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m)
select sum(cores_used) from slurm_detail_node_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m)
select mean(percentage) from (select sum(cores_used)/sum(cores_avail_total)*100 as percentage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m))
select mean(percentage) from (select sum(mem_allocated)/sum(mem_avail_total)*100 as percentage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m))
select mean(percentage) from (select sum(gpu_used)/sum(gpu_avail_total)*100 as percentage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m))
select sum(mem_allocated)/sum(mem_avail_total)*100 from slurm_detail_node_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m)
select sum(mem_allocated) from slurm_detail_node_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m)
select sum(gpu_used)/sum(gpu_avail_total)*100 from slurm_detail_node_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m)
select sum(gpu_used) from slurm_detail_node_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m)

select mean(percentage) from (select sum(cores_used)/sum(cores_avail_total)*100 as percentage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m)) group by time(5m)

select mean(percentage) from (select sum(mem_allocated)/sum(mem_avail_total)*100 as percentage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m)) group by time(5m)

select mean(percentage) from (select sum(gpu_used)/sum(gpu_avail_total)*100 as percentage from slurm_detail_node_data where $timeFilter and partition =~ /^$partition/ group by time(5m)) group by time(5m)
select sum(cores_used) from slurm_user_resource_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m),username

panels.title: Core Usage Over Time By User

targets.query: select sum(mem_used_mb) from slurm_user_resource_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m),username

panels.title: Memory Usage Over Time By User

targets.query: select sum(gpus_used) from slurm_user_resource_data where partition =~ /^$partition/ and $timeFilter group by time(5m),username

panels.title: GPU Usage Over Time By User

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM slurm_jobsumdata WITH KEY = "partition"
list.label: Queue
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM slurm_jobsumdata WITH KEY = "partition"
